218
SEPARATE DECREE ON A LEGACY
(1) If heirs do not oppose a legacy, the court may, at the request of a legatee and prior to the decree of distribution, issue a separate decree on the legacy.
(2) In such case, the provisions on sending the final decree of distribution to the competent tax office, on the entry in the land register and on the delivery of movable property deposited at court, shall apply mutatis mutandis.
